2000.Description: Attempted to send a email to a user but it failed to be sent for some reason

1700.Description: Some unexpected Multer Error occurred when a user was uploading a picture

1701.Description: Some unexpected FileUploadError occurred when a user was uploading a picture

1702.Description: The AWS s3 access key was invalid when a user was uploading a picture

1703.Description: The AWS s3 key signature did not match when a user was uploading a picture

1704.Description: The AWS s3 bucket could not be found when a user was uploading a picture

1705.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when a user was uploading a picture
When a user was uploading a file, a unique file name could not be found after 5 tries

1706.Description: When removing a image, some unexpected error occurred

1707.Description: When a user was uploading a image, some error occurred when checking the database to see if that file exists

2200.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when trying to increment a users login attempts

1600.Description: An error occurred when trying to remove a no longer valid TempVerificationCode record

1602.Description: A error occurred sending out a users verification code through email

1603.Description: A error occurred when updating a users record when they just logged in.  Database was not able to update last login, password attempts, etc.

1604.Description: A error occurred when updating a users verifcation attempts on a failed attempt

1605.Description: A error occurred when updating a users verifcation attempts when they just validated the verification code

1606.Description: A error occurred when updating a users verification attempts.  The users attempts are set to less than or equal to 3 but the verificationLocked timestamp is not null

1607.Description: An error occurred when updating a users verification attempts.  The users attempts are greater than 3 but the verificationLocked timestamp is null

1608.Description: An error occurred when updating a users verification attempts.  Some unexpected combination of the users attempts and verificationLocked time was detected

1609.Description: An error occurred when updating a users verification attempts.  THe user either did not exist or the update did not succeed for some reason

1610.Description: An error occurred when saving a users temp verificaion code record to the database.

1611.Description: Could not succesfully generate a unique salt that is not being used after 5 attempts for a users temporary verificaiton code

1614.Description: An unexpected error occurred when trying to increment a users password attempts when a user provided invalid credentials

1615.Description: An unexpected error occurred when trying to increment a users password attempts when a user tried to login to an account that was already locked

1500.Description: A user was trying to add a movie to their watch list but the update to the database failed.  Usually means the association already exists.

1501.Description: A user was trying to remove a movie from their watch list but the update to the database failed

1502.Description: A user was trying to add a movie to their watched list but the udpate to the database failed.  Usually means the association already exists.

1503.Description: A user was trying to remove a movie from their watched list but the update to the database failed

1000.Description: Occurs if res.locals.skipAuthentication is set to true but the type is not.  for updating the users image.  This should just about never occur as res.locals.skipAuthentication is only.  Set to true if updating a users image

1001.Description: A user tried to follow another user but the update to the database failed

1002.Description: A user tried to unfollow another user but the update to the database failed

1004.Description: A user tried to update their information but some unexpected constraint error occurred

1005.Description: A user tried to update their information but some unexpected database failure occurred

1006.Description: A user tried to delete their account but the update to the database failed

1007.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occurred when a user tried to set their picture to null

1008.Description: A user tried to delete their profile picture but the update to the database failed

1009.Description: A user tried to delete their profile picture but some unexpected error occured when removing it from AWS

1010.Description: A user tried to upate their picture but it overwrote another users picture as they have the same file name, thus two users pictures are now wrong

1011.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occured when a user tried to update their picture on the database

1012.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when a user tried to update their picture on the database

1013.Description: The salt used to encrypt the users password was already in use

1014.Description: Could not generate a unique salt when trying to store the users new password

1100.Description: A user attempted to create a review but it failed to be created on the database for some reason

1101.Description: Some unexpected foreign key constraint error occurred when a user was updating or creating a review

1102.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occurred when a user was updating or creating a review

1103.Description: Some unexpected error occurred on the database when a user tried to update or create a review

1104.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occurred when adding a tag to a review

1105.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when adding a tag to a review

1200.Description: A user tried to delete a review but the update to the database failed

1201.Description: A user tried to like a review post but the update to the database failed

1202.Description: A user tried to remove a like from a review post but the update to the database failed

1203.Description: A user tried to post a comment on a review post but a unknown constraint error occurred

1205.Description: A user tried to update a comment on a review post but the update to the database failed

1206.Description: A user tried to remove a comment from a review post but the update to the database failed

1300.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but some unexpected constraint error occurred

1302.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but the verification email failed to be sent out

1304.Description: A user attempting to sign up tried to have their verification code resent but the email did not get sent out

1305.Description: When creating a users official account the update to the database failed

1306.Description: When removing a temporary user the update to the database failed

1307.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but unable to generate a unique salt to encrypt their password

1308.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but unable to generate a unique salt to encrypt their verification code

1309.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but unable to generate a unique salt to encrypt their verification code.  When attempting to remove the temp user another error occurred

1310.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but a unexpected error occurred when creating their verification code.  When attempting to remove the temp user another error occurred

1311.Description: A user was attempting to resend their verification code but unable to generate a unique salt to encrypt their verification code

1312.Description: A users new verification code was sent out but some unexpected error occurred incrementing their codes resent

1313.Description: A user was attempting to resend their verification code but was unable to create a new record as a record already existed for the user.  The record was most likely created after the delete finished

1314.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but unable to generate a unique salt to encrypt their password.  When attempting to remove the temp user another error occurred

1315.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but a unexpected error occurred when creating their password record.  When attempting to remove the temp user another error occurred

1316.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but a unexpected error occurred when creating their authentication attemps record.  When attempting to remove the temp user another error occurred

1317.Description: When attempting to create a users Authentication Attempts record, the users id did not exist

1318.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but an error occurred when creating their authentication attemps record.  When attempting to remove the user another error occurred

1319.Description: A unverified user account exists without a authentication attempts record

1320.Description: A unverified user account exists without a authentication attempts record

1321.Description: A unexpected error occurred when trying to remove a user that has expired

1322.Description: A unexpected error occurred when trying to remove a unverified user

1323.Description: A unexpected error occurred when trying to remove a user that has expired

1324.Description: Failed to create a user and the user returned from the find or create was null

1325.Description: A unexpected error occurred when trying to remove a user that has expired

1801.Description: Some unexpected foreign key constraint error occurred

1802.Description: Some unexpected unique constraint error occurred

2100.Description: When generating a new session for a user, there was a error removing the old session

2200.Description: A error occurred in the main error handler
